title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 227: Featuring Adrian Aucoin
description:
On Monday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys are joined by Adrian Aucoin. Adrian joins to talk about his time playing with Biz, coaching his kids, his career and a ton more. The boys also breaking down all the Taylor Hall rumors and discuss teams he could possibly be dealt to along with the cost it might take to get him. The guys also talk NHL news and as always, RA wraps up the show with a (02:05:00) Gambling Corner.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
